roleset.name: to deny or prove to be false
roleset.note: REFUTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'refute' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from refute.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: AT& T-1 assembled three of its top executives in Washington , all visibly angry , [*-1]-2 to try [*-2] to refute MCI 's charges .
